app.services.ig_scraping

Module providing functions for scraping information from instagram accounts.

Module Contents

Classes

GetInstagramProfile

Class to load a profile and download its data.

Functions

load_post_captions_from_json(→ list)

Function to load post captions from a json file. The post loaded are the one specified by the shortcodes list.

Attributes

settings

logger

app.services.ig_scraping.settings
app.services.ig_scraping.logger
class app.services.ig_scraping.GetInstagramProfile

Class to load a profile and download its data.

download_users_profile_picture(username: str) → None

Download a user’s profile picture.

download_users_posts_with_periods(username: str) → None

Download posts from a user within a specified period of time.

download_hastag_posts(hashtag: str) → None

Download posts that contains a certain hashtag.

get_users_followers(user_name: str) → None

Function to get a profile’s followers. Note: login required to get a profile’s followers.

get_users_followings(username: str) → None

Function to get a profile’s followings. Note: login required to get a profile’s followings.

get_post_comments(username: str) → None

Function to get a post’s comments and print them at screen.

get_post_info_csv(username: str) → None

Function to get info from every post of a user and store them in a csv file.

get_post_info_json(username: str, last_n_posts: int = 100) → Iterator[dict]

Function to get info from every post of a user and store them in a json file (dictionary style).

app.services.ig_scraping.load_post_captions_from_json(json_file: str, shortcodes: Optional[list] = None) → list

Function to load post captions from a json file. The post loaded are the one specified by the shortcodes list. This to allow compatibility with eventual search functions on the specific post.
